title: Himalayan Gold Tea
content: A premium black tea sourced from the highlands of Ilam, offering a rich aroma and bold flavor.

title: Ilam Green Bliss
content: Hand-picked green tea with delicate floral notes and a refreshing aftertaste. Perfect for relaxation.

title: Classic Masala Chai
content: A blend of robust black tea and aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and clovesâ€”perfect for a warm, spicy cup.

title: White Pearl Tea
content: Rare white tea leaves with a smooth, delicate taste and high antioxidant content. A luxurious choice for tea lovers.

title: Organic Tulsi Herbal Tea
content: A caffeine-free herbal infusion made from fresh tulsi leaves, known for its stress-relieving and immunity-boosting benefits.
